content: a cozy comfortable pull through scarf perfect for dressing up any outifit **free version can be found on my blog 1 ** **size ** one size adult **skill level ** easy **yarn **#5 bulky weight used in example is caron latte cakes **hook size ** us size j/10 6 0mm - adjust hook size if needed to meet gauge **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet *this pattern has been fully tested to ensure accuracy* copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //www simplyhookedbyjanet com/waterfall-wrap-scarf-crochet-pattern/
